annotate module¶

class annotate.FaceAnnotator(img_id, classifier, mod_path)[source]¶

Bases: object

run_annotator()[source]¶

Create predictor and run landmark detection algorithm.

Fetch detected face bounding rectangle coordinates from corresponding csv file in data/face/, create dlib rectangle, use dlib shape predictor to place landmark from classifier, save matrix to pandas dataframe.

Parameters:None
Returns:dataframe – matrix containing the coordinates of the 68 landmarks placed on the detected face.
Return type:pandas
